filteredArticles.headline: Penn study finds political beliefs affect how Americans follow distancing guidelines
filteredArticles.abstract: The researchers found that people who identified as Democrats were more likely to engage in physical distancing than people who identified as Republicans.
filteredArticles.infobox:

dominantMedia.title: Social Distancing PSA CDC Boston.jpg
dominantMedia.content: A PSA by the CDC reminded people in Boston to practice social distancing.

filteredArticles.headline: Antibody test developed at Penn finds low levels of coronavirus exposure among HUP workers
filteredArticles.abstract: Results of the Penn study found that most of the 300 workers tested negative for the antibodies that would indicate infection from the coronavirus.
filteredArticles.infobox:
RELATED:

Three Penn students test positive for coronavirus after traveling abroad for spring break

dominantMedia.title: HUP Penn Medicine.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Most of the 300 HUP healthcare workers tested did not have coronavirus antibodies.
